ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] One more question.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, everyone s KoS in Mistmoore. Not all dark elves like each other, just as not all humans do. Mistmoore has its own faction. -- Words of the Sentient:
ygData.messageBody:
--- Laurie <laurienymphet@...> wrote:
>
> Last kina newbie question(I promise);-)
> As a De Necro am I KOS in Mistmoore ?Im doing my Sol Ro temple
> quest for my boots and gloves and it would be nice if I could just
> walk in there and get what I need.(Some Scepter I think I have to lay
> or give a flower to someone)Sorry to be a pest but Allaks.Faction
> section seems to be down ATM.

Yeah, everyone's KoS in Mistmoore. Not all dark elves like each other, just
as not all humans do. Mistmoore has its own faction.

--

-- George Will
